original_text: There was an important officer who ruled the island. He was called Publius. He had some fields near to the shore where we had made the fire. He was very kind to us. He asked us to stay in his house. We stayed there for three days.
korean_text: 이 섬에서 가장 높은 사람 보블리오라 하는 이가 그 근처에 토지가 있는지라 그가 우리를 영접하여 사흘이나 친절히 머물게 하더니

sentences.original_text: He had some fields near to the shore
where we had made the fire
He was very kind to us
He asked us to stay in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리에게 그의 집에 머물라고 했다

sentences.original_text: We stayed there for three days
